Email 3.subject: RE: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

Email 4.subject: Re: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

body.text:
Hello Komal,


I trust this email finds you well.



I am writing to provide feedback on our Surfactant RFP, specifically on the pricing submitted. We have thoroughly reviewed your proposal, and I have attached a detailed feedback document specific to your quotation. Please find the following documents for your review:



Your original price quotation submission

Our detailed feedback and observations



Based on our assessment:
We observe that current pricing levels require further optimization to align with our target objectives
We believe there remains room for improvement in terms of competitiveness
We invite you to revisit your quotation and submit a revised pricing that reflects your most competitive offer


Please submit your updated pricing at your earliest convenience.

If you have any questions or require any clarification regarding our feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out.



We look forward to your response and continuing our discussions.



Best regards,

________________________________

Email 5.subject: Fw: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

Email 6.subject: Re: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

body.text:
Hello Komal,

No errors...

We have different CAS depending on the code used (following applications) and we need to proceed with the informed one for each approval.
Let me know if is possible to follow the CAS indication and if will need to change the trade name to track. This is important on our approval and supply process.

Some CAS are broader used or more restricted and if you see justification to follow other CAS, we will need a letter saying that are similar.


Thanks!

Naylil Capreti

Global Sourcing Lead – Surfactants

ECOLAB SPAIN SERVICES

AVDA. BAIX LLOBREGAT 3-5

08970, SANT JOAN DESPÍ (BARCELONA) SPAIN

Phone (Changed) +55 11 95068 1917

E naylil.capreti@ecolab.com<mailto:naylil.capreti@ecolab.com>

Email 8.subject: RE: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

body.text:
Dear Naylil,



Good Afternoon !



We would like to inform you that the EXW prices we shared already include the packaging cost. As you requested a breakdown for drums and totes, please note that all the pricing provided is based on totes.



Wherever the pricing column is left blank, it indicates that we are currently unable to offer those specific products. For DDP price, we will need your complete delivery address. Once we have that, we can provide you with the DDP pricing accordingly.



Regarding stock availability and CAS numbers, we will get back to you shortly with the required information.

Email 9.subject: RE: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

body.text:
Hello Komal

As per our discussion, could you check price break up for packaging. Do not change the original format and columns.

Pls recommend the product which are matching CAS# with Ecolab CAS#

Kindly reply to all queries asked by Naylil

Regards

Shailesh Firake

Hello Komal,



Thank you for your submission. I will be reviewing the proposal and will inform you if any additional details are needed before providing final feedback.

I noticed that is no package adder included. Could you please confirm if the EXW price includes package costs? Can you breakdown to have bulk prices and drum or tote prices, please?



Quick pre evaluation shows me some CAS differences:

I would also like to confirm whether the unquoted lines indicate that Matangi is unable to supply. Please confirm if this is the case, as we will use this information to guide future developments— after to confirm that the pricing is competitive and the basic requirements are met. If Matangi is not identified as a development opportunity at this stage, we will not consider it for future allocations.



I am assuming from our previous conversation that Matangi can delivery on DDP incoterm. Can you please confirm in which regions and the level of stock that can be managed, please?



Thanks!

Naylil Capreti

Email 15.subject: RE: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

body.text: Dear Naylil, Good Evening ! Well noted on your instructions below. We would like to inform you that we will be able to submit it on Monday. Kindly confirm if this is acceptable.

Email 16.subject: Surfactants RFP_update for new approval process

body.text:
Hello,

Maricarmen Justo conducted a Surfactant RFP last year, covering AA, AE, and EOPO. Since taking over her responsibilities, I have assumed global responsibility for Surfactants. Previously, I focused solely on EOPO, but my scope now includes AA and AE as well.

Attached is a consolidated file outlining our priorities (76 lines) and providing insights into R12 volumes and available volumes. As my focus is on total volumes, I am requesting EXW prices along with select CIF offers. Any additional information required will be addressed during the process.

My objective is to update pricing and gather essential information to determine the most suitable suppliers for the approval process.

Our primary criterion is specification alignment, and to facilitate this, I have included a reference trade name. Beyond competitiveness, we are also seeking suppliers who can support Ecolab’s standard requirements, including payment terms, formulation, and warehouse locations.

Please provide the requested information by Friday, the 30th. Additionally, kindly confirm receipt of this request and let me know if providing feedback by Friday is feasible.

For clarity, I will not provide challenges or detailed feedback—our goal is simply to determine whether we can proceed in the approval process or not.

Regarding EOPO, if you are already in the approval process this will help us to accelerate it.



Thank you for your time and support. Me, Fay and Shailesh will be available if need any additional information.

Thanks!

Naylil Capreti

Global Sourcing Lead – Surfactants

ECOLAB SPAIN SERVICES

AVDA. BAIX LLOBREGAT 3-5

08970, SANT JOAN DESPÍ (BARCELONA) SPAIN

Phone (Changed) +55 11 95068 1917

E naylil.capreti@ecolab.com<mailto:naylil.capreti@ecolab.com>



CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail communication and any attachments may contain proprietary and privileged information for the use of the designated recipients named above. Any unauthorized review, use, disclosure or distribution is prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient, please contact the sender by reply e-mail and destroy all copies of the original message.
